## Set Up Data

```{r}

attribs <- c("age_bucket", "race_simple", "sex_val")

```


```{r}
specs <- expand_grid(
  run = 1:3, 
  epsilon = c(1, 5, 10, 20),
  opt_in = c(0.1, 0.5, 0.9, 1)
)
```

### Central Methods

### Local Methods

```{r}
prep_data <- function(data, opt_in) {
  
  data |>
      add_prob_opt_in(prob = opt_in) |>
      add_opt_in() |>
      add_D_i(attribs)
  
}

summarize_results <- function(data) {
  
  data |>
    group_by(epsilon, opt_in) |>
    summarize(
      mean_error = mean(n - n_noisy),
      mean_abs_error = mean(abs(n - n_noisy))
    ) |>
    ungroup()
  
}
```
